txt.en: You have destroyed many of the evil sarcophagi in Dâr Grazadh.
Evil sarcophagi can be found in Dâr Grazadh.\n\nYou should destroy the sarcophagi.
You have destroyed many evil sarcophagi at Dâr Grazadh. The Rangers of Ithilien will be pleased with your efforts.

Dâr Grazadh, once a great guild-hall of Minas Ithil, is now a hall of rot that houses the Dead in corrupted sarcophagi. These sarcophagi should be destroyed for they certainly contain corpses awaiting some dark necromancy.
Evil Sarcophagi can be found in Dâr Grazadh.\n\nYou should destroy the sarcophagi.
Dâr Grazadh, once a great guild-hall of Minas Ithil, is now a hall of rot that houses the Dead in their many forms.
